data.title: Simpson Dental PLLC
data.meta_description: Meet Our Doctors Dental Care with Generational History in Charleston, WV The dentists at Simpson Dental PLLC care for you […]
data.text:
Christen Simpson Raynes, DDS, MBA received her Bachelor of Arts in biology and her DDS degree from West Virginia University. She chose to expand her business knowledge, receiving her MBA from the University of Charleston. Dr. Christen continually strives to be on the forefront of dentistry, staying well informed of new technologies while improving care for the next generation of patients. She is known for her compassion, gentle touch and caring approach to each patient she treats. She is happy to be the third generation of Simpson dentists carrying on the tradition of providing beautiful smiles.

Dr. Christen is active in the community as a part of the Charleston Area Alliances and the Gabriel Project. Dr. Christen also volunteers at Health Right to provide dental care to the underprivileged adults of West Virginia.

Dr. Christen was selected to the Young Guns Class of 2009. Young Guns is a group of upcoming, select professionals who are community movers and strive to make West Virginia great. Dr. Christen was selected by WV Executive Magazine for their “Young Guns Reloaded” issue to honor her achievements since being selected as a Young Gun eight years earlier. She was also selected by the State Journal in 2010 to be among the “Top 40 Professionals Under 40.”

Most recently, Dr. Christen was selected as one of Incisal Edge’s 40 under 40 America’s Best Young Dentists. Incisal Edge, published by Benco Dental, the leading lifestyle magazine for dental professionals nationwide, selects 40 of the top young dentists in the nation. Incisal Edge celebrates dentists’ achievements both inside the operatory and during their hard-earned downtime.

Dr. Christen enjoys spending time with her husband, Derek, and her two kids, Ben and Adia. They enjoy watching WVU sports and outdoor activities such as camping, biking and skiing.
